scenario_text.value: Man... Man oh man oh man oh man...
Minoru, what happened?!

T-Takuma... It was a g-g-GHOST... An actual
ghost!
(So now even Minoru’s seen it?!)
Hey! What was all that screaming?!
Ryo... Minoru says he saw it too.
Saw it? You mean...
It was an actual ghost. It was real.
Heh, you see? What’d I tell you?
(Why is Ryo being so smug about this?)

Serves you right for not believing me! Look
who’s scared now!

Who said I was scared! I just tripped, that’s
all!
(This could turn ugly. What do I say?!)
This isn’t the time!
I had my doubts too.
Ryo, that’s enough.
This isn’t the time!

Both of you knock it off! This is no time for
a fight!

Obviously something is going on here, so we
gotta keep cool and deal with it.
Oh, yeah, you’re right...
Sorry...
I had my doubts too.
To be honest, I had my doubts too.
You too, Takuma?!

But with this many witnesses, it’s gotta be
true. We need to deal with this somehow.
Yeah, right! We gotta figure somethin’ out!

B-besides, It’s too scar—er, creepy just
waiting around. Uh, wait, I mean...
Aha! I knew you were scared!
Shut up!
Ryo, that’s enough.

Ryo, that’s enough. Minoru is genuinely upset
right now.

Yeah, you’re right. It’d just be mean to pick
on a scared little kid like that.

You... Damn it! You’re gonna regret saying
that!
Minoru, that’s enough out of you, too.

Let’s focus on solving the problem. Since
this could be important,

we should get everyone together and talk
things out.

Good idea! Everyone together! To talk this
out.

Not so funny when the shoe’s on the other
foot, huh?
